title: 9月8之前 希望美國同香港巴打聽我講兩句

replies.msg:
聽日未必嚟到，所以今日喺度同大家講兩句，唔好嫌小弟長氣：

Many have asked me this question, “why don’t you go back to the US?” Hong Kong is not only home, but also my root. Even I can leave for the States anytime, I would rather die in this city.

America fought in World War II against evil tyrants who wished to enslave the entire world. For years we stand for freedom and democracy, as the leader of the free world, I believe that it is our obligation to continue to support those who fight for freedom and democracy, in this case Hong Kong.

As Winston Churchill addressed the British Parliament in the 1940, “we shall defend our island, whatever the cost may be.”

The American Congress is working on a bill called “Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act”, which I believe will make sure the Chinese and Hong Kong Communist governments not dare to contempt.

However, this Act will not provide a swift ending to this power struggle. So, I beg my fellow Hong Kongers with good conscious that we will continue the fight until the victory is ours. I hope you all hold tight to our value, our cause and our believes to bring this tyrannical government and this corrupted system to justice.

As President Abraham Lincoln said during the Gettysburg Address in 1863, “that government of the people, by the people, for the people shall not perish from the earth.”

Is the Hong Kong government doing its job now?

When a government does not represent its people, here is my words to it and its leader: it is your intention to push Hong Kong over the cliff into the abyss, do NOT frame true Hong Kongers for your fault. How dare you sold Hong Kong out! Carrie Lam, be prepared to suffer eternal damnation!

Succeed may not come in a brink of the eyes, but it is the courage to continue that counts. Therefore, courage and hope are our biggest ammunitions. Courage to carry on, hope for freedom and democracy.

America, support Hong Kongers as much as you can. Hong Kong, keep calm, be rational and carry on. We shall never surrender.

May God bless you, may God bless Hong Kong, may God bless the Untied states of America.



光復香港 時代革命
五大訴求 缺一不可

出黎呀，自由閪！


不闖入、不塗鴉、不鐳射
如有發現，批淮大家往死裡打
